fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> The first time you /Join a player, they join a new faction instead of their own. A member of a REF can’t join a good faction. If this can’t work because your target has no faction to join, this instead does nothing.

> The second time you /Join someone, they join as a new player. This new player has a new role, and the player controls both roles. The new player won’t join factional chats.

> The first time you /Unjoin a player, they cannot vote or talk the next day.

> The second time you /Unjoin a player, they unjoin life (Dealt an Overkill attack)

> You can target yourself.
